# Lesson 1: Intro to Matrix

Let's explore some data representations!

::: {.callout-note icon="false"}
## Notice and Wonder

```{r}
data_matriks <- tibble(
  x = rep(1:3, times = 3),
  y = rep(1:3, each = 3),
  z = c(1, 3, 1,
        3, 5, 2,
        2, 1, 3)
)
plot_tile <- data_matriks |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) + 
  geom_tile(
    aes(fill = z),
    show.legend = FALSE
  ) + 
  scale_fill_viridis_c() + 
  theme_void()
plot_gg(plot_tile, scale = 200, multicore = TRUE)
```

What do you notice? What do you wonder?
:::
